mapper.name: sample interview transcript
mapper.value:
AI: Good morning. I have 20 minutes available to discuss potential solutions. What specific data platform challenges are you proposing to address with your SAS offering?
User: How do you like that the Wix have a tool?
AI: I do not have any experience with Wix. It is not relevant to our data platform strategy. We require solutions
User: Now setting data rates.
AI: data rates for what specific service or product.

​

parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays
